Blog.post: mMm..went for the jap club todae..mark so shuai..wahaha..=X..mm..went for singing lesson after that.sang quite alot todae cz onli 5 person there.Mm..mood swing now.Sianz..I feel that i somehow like aaron leh..But i somehow dun like him also..i also duno..its like i like him la..duno how he feels though.But i juz got this feeling that even if we got together we wun last one loh.Duno y la..feel like goin for flings now..but cant bear to do that also.Afraid of hurting ppl..zZ.. Very tired uhh.... Aniwae im ushering huang yida on tues!!!woo..he coming np for performance ma..wahaha..then that dae after scc mi n jocelyn stayed back to chat with jon they all ma..then weijian ask jon wana usher yida anot loh..then ask mi n joce also..woohoo..lolzz..so song..excited sia!=P.Aniwae i went thru the scc interview AT LAST!wahaha..mm..guess it turned out fine ba..yida yida!! yoohoo..cant wait uhh..nxt week's gona be exciting!Tues got yida..fri got hop nite!!!woooo~. Its gona be damn fun i guess..=D..Reallie looking forward to it..! Okie lahh..i shall end here..Aaron nv call mi todae siaa..so siann..but kz la..chattin with him on msn now..kZ..nitEz..

uhH..its reallie a damn bad day today loh..or shld i sae ytd..cz its already midnight ler..mm~lots n lots of things happened.Alfred broke with joanne ler.Another break-up..haizz..Mm..Then Aaron told mi he cried loh.Cause he reallie cant tahan ler.His girlfrien told him that she hate him..zZ..how sad~.zZ..then i like hai till him also loh. Cause just now i msg him ask him whad time they coming to ktv ma..then kx beside him..n he saw the msg..mm..then aaron sae that he like after seeing the msg not very happy liddat loh. Then kinda give him attitude.zZzz..then he sae cannot let anione noe he got tok to mi de loh..if not sure die..hmm..yar..can understand lah.But im kinda pissed off after i hear the kx thing loh.Its like im juz his mei loh..he should understand that its impossible between the two of us de..so y shld he be unhappy over whu i tok to n stuffs liddat.Hey..i have my freedom yar?. I'm also kinda disappointed in kx loh.I thot he was those devoted kind.But i juz found out that he actuallie likes sophia also.Okie lah..its not like i want him to be devoted to mi or whad loh..i'll be happy for him if he finds someone else whom he like..its just that i THOUGHT he's the devoted kind..But..well well..no comments lah.. Mm..its a real bad dae for peline also loh.She's gona get sued if she don't pay 20 thousand.dOtxx..just cz she didnt wait for the so called big boss to arrive b4 leaving..then duno got whad alot of problem.zZzz..this's seriously damn crazy loh..zZzz..Somemore her stead msg her by mistake,a msg that he was supposed to send to his ex loh.That msg still got write whad "aniwae mi n her r kinda through already".Whad the hell..he's obviously fooling her loh.zZzz.. Then she almost cried just now.uHh..poor her~=( uhh..everything's in a mess todae..zZzz..Just hope that tomorrow will be a betta dae ba.. okie..gtg n sleep ler..meeting aaron at 8am tomorrow..he's teaching mi poa..gd nites!

hMm..went for make up class todae.~uhh..stupid sam tell mi that it was theory ytd,when it was actually practical!dotXx..they sang i believe lohh..*_*..zZzz..wasted.Mm..then today make up class sing xin dong againn~..sIanZ..mMm..gotta prepare one of the songs we learnt,to sing next week.Dont know whad song to sing lehh.Yujian?Yong qi?Zhi shao hai you ni?Kai shi dong le?Xin dong?or i believe.Hmm..wanted to sing i believe..but that time lesson never go.He want us to "zhuan ying" at where all that also duno leh.hmm....mayb will sing xin dong or zhi shao hai you ni ba..~.Ehh..then fang lao shi(anthony) told us that we'll be goin to the studio to record a song during the fourth month!!woohoo..excited siaa........wahaha..:D mm..just now aaron added mi in msn.Then chat chat chat.Found out that he n his girlfrien has broken off.Sad siaa..this period like breaking period liddat.So many couples broke off..zZz.-_-". N haiz..poor him~His ex condemned him in her blog.Make him sound like jerk liddat.So badd..hmm..then he very pissed off loh.Called mi to chat..n told mi bout it.Mm..no comments bout it lah.There's no rite or wrong in a relationship.Yupp.Hmm..chatted for quite long.around 2 hours liddat ba.Got to know him betta.Quite a nice chap.Just that he keep saying that i'm a stupid dumb dumb.Zzzz..dumb ass!*hiaKz.Hmm..by the time we hang the phone it was already 3+ am ler.Duno y not tired yet..So come n write blog lohh.Okie lahh..i'll end here.Go n read teens le.Good niteS!

woo..first time writing a blog.kinda excited.just hope i'll have the determination to come n update it every now n then.hmmm..okie now..let mi start. mM..todae is the 16th again.it would have been 1 year n 5 months if we're still together.Well.. i've fully recovered.Will still reminisce though.But no special feelings animore.Wonder how he's doing....if he has fully recovered or whad....hmmm....? Went to school as usual todae.i love fridays!cz lessons onli start at 1pm for odd weeks,n 3pm for even weeks.rocks rite.mMm..went to the japanese duno whad club with vanessa n jiahui after lessons.Found the ice breaking games reallie stupid at first.Wanted to leave.But somehow we stayed on lah.Then continue the second round of ice breaking game.mM..we're supposed to intro ourselves n do something to the pillow given lah.Yarr..n uh..i ran out of things to do when it was my turn..and so i actually kissed it.bleah.n so after the introduction..we're supposed to do the same action we did to the pillow,to the person sittin alternate to us.uHh..n i was soooo "lucky" to sit alternate someone who stripped n hug the pillow!zZzz..mM..he's out senior..year 2 i guess.yupp.n so when it was his turn..he put on a jacket for mi..n took it off after that.omG..can u imagine it~it was so damn embarrasing loh.Reallie got the being stripped feeling as i was wearing halter top..uhhh..can imagine how red my face was at that time.*.*n hey..its not the end yett.After that,they asked him to hug mii..saying that he hugged the pillow just now.goSh..then he come over n hug mi.It was tight.Feel as if my specs are goin to break.Hmm..but comfortable though.=P.yupP..it feels kinda good la.Perhaps cause he's tall n has broad shoulders.Hmm hMm..quite good looking too..=xXxX..=P.Mm..still not sure if we wana join the club..so we went over to ask him if we can decide next week..yupp..then got his contact..cause he ask us to tell him if we wana join anot soon..as he wants us to be gls or smth liddat.yeahh..then got his msg just now..saying that there'll be something bout kimono next week..n ask us to drop by if we're free loh.Yeahh..then asked him a few stuffs bout it.Mm..got his email@ too.Well..i admit that i am kinda interested in him lah.=X..hmm hmm.. mmm..kx juz told mi thru msn that he has some health problem.His nose bleed very often..n tis has been goin on for 3 1/2 years already..uhh..hope that its nothing serious..God bless!

uhh..damn..another bad dae for mi..friday the 13th!sUx maN!..FIRST..i forgot to bring my damn wallet and card holder out..zz..so gotta go home n take.SECOND..screwed up the stupid bca review..zz siaa..the teacher ask mi i duno how to ans lohh..then she ask second ques that time kwong weng help mi a little..i think she sure noe one lohh..uhh..gona get damn low for bca i guess.THIRD..CATS presentation..we didnt know must write out whad to sae and stuffs sia.Then we never prepare anithing.Then presentation that time other grps well prepared siaa..some even got powerpoint presentation lohh..uhh..gona get damn low also.Thats not the end.Went a little off pitch for my singing exam!uhhh..too nervous i guess..then i sang without feelings and everything..gosh..but at least managed to get promoted to intermediate..*phew. Yarr..aniwae i sang xin dong for the exam laa..shld've sang yong qi instead..but well nvm laa..its over lerr..uhh..damn siann..tmr must do project againn..its gettin mi stress man..dotxx..kz laa..shall write till here..

Uhh.My day started off real bad man.I waited for a cab for like almost 1/2 hr ++ loh.Was late for the takada high sch xchange programme already.Damn worried.Finally got a cab.Got on it.N guess whaD?just as the uncle was driving off,a fucking man came n knock the window panel,n told the driver that he raised his hand first so he should drive him n not mi.N he even asked mi to get off!Whad the fug man.DAmn him.Didnt want to argue with that stupid unreasonable plump man.N so i got off the cab.ZzzZ..-_-".Everyone at the bus stop was looking at mi loh!This's bloody damn embarrasing.Gosh.N thats not the end loh~when he got up the cab,he still gave mi that "yay,i won" look.Liew..C liao reallie feel like showing him my beautiful middle finger man.But i somehow managed to keep my cool.So proud of myself.=). Uhh..vanessa n jiahui waited for mi b4 proceeding to LT 26.(thanks uh~)=).Mm..lucky didnt get reprimanded or anithing lah.Yupp..The rest of the dae went pretty well.Mi n vanessa r like too crazy gurls taking photo ard.Haha.N yar..the japs are reallie cute.Kawaii nehh..=D Went to paradise centre de kbox with jacky,joseph,jocelyn,jasmine,jessie n marilyn after that.It was alright lah.I was the onli high one there.Wahaha..Crazy gurl.Yar..n im refering to myself.Lolz..Mm.sang till ard 7+ lohh..Then went for singing lesson.Was late.Mm..sang liu ruo ying's "wo deng ni" todae.Nice song~.But was kinda disappointed that we didnt get to sing chang hui mei's "jian ai" loh.Oh man..i love that song.Uhh..n next week singing exam liao..papa~..hope everything will juz go well loh..God bless~

Went for the nra audition todae.Yupp..manage to get thru somehow.Was kinda shocked.Cz i didnt realie dance well n there was like so damn many ppl there.Thats reallie lucky of mi.Yeah. But theres still another interview lah.Heard that we'll be asked many tough ques.Hahaa..thot of my answer for all the ques already.They're gona be WORLD PEACE.WAhaha..thats reallie lame uh.Mm..well..jocelyn didnt get thru it.Although she didnt sae it out,can sense her disappoinment. Haiz~but theres reallie nothing i can do yar.Mi,jasmine,clement,joseph,frances and glen all got thru.Mm..aniwae IF i reallie manage to get thru the interview,i dont even noe if i'll join nra.Cause its on the same dae as scc.Damn it.Scc starts at 5.30 n ends at 7.30.Nra starts at 6.30 and ends at 7.30.Which means that if i were to join nra,i'll have to leave scc at 6.30.Dotxx..don't think i'll want to do that.I'll rather give nra up.BUT i seriously need nra to slim down.Haha.CAnnot make it liao.Getting fatter each dae.Whad da hell.Mm..mayb i'll juz try n c how lah.If reallie cannot then quit nra.BlaH..all that will onli come if i get into nra.SO,lets not think so much first. Mm..went for dinner at macs after the audition with jasmine,jessie,her friens,eric,muntat,teckseng,glen,frances,joseph.Teckseng's complexion like not that bad ler.But he's like still as dao as ever.*peNgz.Come poly liao still so anti social.Cannot make it lah. =X Haha..at mac that time jasmine they all sae eric damn shuai.I agree lah.its true.Mm..Then goin home that time jocelyn tell mi "if he(eric) older abit,he'll give up his bf for him."wahaha..but after that she felt damn bad that she said that lah.So treat it as she has never said anithing like that yar.Aniwae juz now chat with seph in irc..he ask mi bout jocelyn.Haha..told him that she's attached.Just too bad uh.he reallie die liao lah.Super damn despo.Like got girls then wan liddat.Few days ago juz jio mi.N i told him that he'll juz be wasting his time.Yupp.I guess im like alot more straight forward now uuh.Not like last time..make the guy like mi liao then tell him friends betta or wadeva shit.Yeah. *cLaps for myseLf. Haha.mM..But somehow i like got abit like eric lehh..dont know y..mayb juz a crush?well.who knows?lets just wait n c~

woo..so full now.At last.Todae whole day never eat till sia.Except for a few titbits lah.Then juz now bought mac back to eat.OmG..so fattening uh..but no choice lah..damn hungry..n damn late ler..nothing much to eat also. Mm..went to jap club todae.Mi n van were appointed to be GLs.Poor jiahui.Never get chosen.Duno y they will choose us also lah.WEll well..be Gl also good..can c mark more..wahaha..*bish..so bitchy..Mm..but he reallie damn shuai lehh..=XxxX.Haha..Went to hopnite after that.Sara won the pageant.Peline got third.Uhh..i seriously think she should get second one loh.Shes betta than valarie!=X.Mm..Danced after that.Was quite boring at first.So asked dad to pick mi up at 10.30.But after that it was like damn fun loh.Kinda regretted asking dad to come so early lah.But aniwae we danced with clement,eric,glen,joseph and teckseng.Haha..ts's complexion got betta i guess.Not so much pimples ler.N vanessa danced so sexily man.Cool. Uhh..i must wait for 4 hrs b4 i can slp.Don't wana get fat!Must do 100 situps later.-_-" well well..shall write till here lah.I go n chat ler.Nitez.=D
